about_the_game:
In the Trailmakers: Airborne Expansion you will take to the skies in an epic campaign to save the peaceful Chirpos from the pesky Robot Pirate invasion.

Campaign

In this mission-based campaign you will navigate a brand new Trailmakers-world with deserts, mountains, and beautiful floating islands. The local Chirpo population will grant you increasingly challenging quests as you progress deeper into the dangerous Robot Pirate territory.

As you complete their quests you will receive blocks, parts, engines, wings, thrusters and so much more — giving you all the tools you need to soar the skies majestically like an eagle.

Friendly- and enemy NPCs

The Chirpos are friendly, fuzzy and flightless birds. They hold up in villages scattered across the land — the lucky ones anyway. The less fortunates ones are held in Robot Pirate captivity and the Chirpo Mayor of each village will kindly ask that you bring them home safely.

The Robot Pirates are evil, ruthless and quite agile dog fighters. They will defend their newly invaded territory with fighter planes, flak cannons, blimps, hot air balloons and ground speeders. They are a “shoot first, ask later” kind of people so we advise you to implement the same strategy.

Sandbox map

The new map is a big one — and it’s open for you to explore as you please. You choose your own path but beware: Some areas are more dangerous than others and it’s wise to make sure you are geared up properly before heading into certain areas.

Cleared for take-off

Without revealing too much we would rather let you see it for yourself. So put on your aviators, start your engines and look to the skies in Trailmakers: Airborne.

In this mission-based campaign you will navigate a brand new Trailmakers-world with deserts, mountains, and beautiful floating islands. The local Chirpo population will grant you increasingly challenging quests as you progress deeper into the dangerous Robot Pirate territory.

As you complete their quests you will receive blocks, parts, engines, wings, thrusters and so much more — giving you all the tools you need to soar the skies majestically like an eagle.

The Chirpos are friendly, fuzzy and flightless birds. They hold up in villages scattered across the land — the lucky ones anyway. The less fortunates ones are held in Robot Pirate captivity and the Chirpo Mayor of each village will kindly ask that you bring them home safely.

The Robot Pirates are evil, ruthless and quite agile dog fighters. They will defend their newly invaded territory with fighter planes, flak cannons, blimps, hot air balloons and ground speeders. They are a “shoot first, ask later” kind of people so we advise you to implement the same strategy.

name: Trailmakers: Airborne Expansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5-4440 (3.1 GHz quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A whole new campaign focused on the skies. Face the very first Trailmakers enemies in this expansion and enjoy new blocks, mechanics and missions.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
